page.title: 06TYPES OF HOUSES - TEIGNMOUTH
page.content: In order to get a picture of the houses in Teignmouth the town was divided into two parts, east and west. Some streets were chosen at random, from each part, to study. The streets we looked at on the east side were Barnsley Close and Gorway. The type of housing in Barnsley Close is detached houses with large gardens, garages and driveways. There are 3 or 4 bedrooms in the houses. Some of the houses were modern but some were very old. The houses are all different in design. The homes in Gorway were detached with garages and large gardens. They were also 3 or 4 bedroom houses. In the west side of Teignmouth we looked at the flats at Kingsway. There are 30 flats in each block and there are 4 blocks of flats. Each flat has 2 bedrooms but no garden or garage.
